Articles.Content: I am a furry who has been playing KSP since Version 13, aprox., but has just now registered for the forum. Well, maybe not exactly. I remember posting things under a different name but the forums aren't recognizing my of my emails so I just registered a new account. I most definitely am not good at the game, and often need MechJeb's help just to get to the Mun. I can get into debates that aren't my field of expertise as I have no fields of expertise, but I am attempting to improve this bane of mine and hopefully it won't get me into trouble here. Well, I am not one to talk about myself so let me just say again... hello, fellow rocketeers!

Greetings to you too! Go look in the tutorials section of the forums, there is so much information on manoeuvres, landings, liftoffs etc. That's sure to help you!

Edited August 20, 2013 by Scorpi15
spellcheck
